messages.intro: Enter time in 1/4 hour increments. Do not see an issue you need? Find it and view it and it will show up.
messages.hoursIncrements: Must be a in quarter hour increments (.25, .5, .75)
messages.hoursTooMany: You work too much!  Keep it under 16!
messages.mixedStatuses: This time card has mixed statuses - _WORKLOG_ = _STATUS_

issueGroups.name: Support
issueGroups.query: (assignee='user.name' or issueKey in IssueHistory() or issueKey in updatedBy('user.name', '-3w', '1d') or watcher = 'user.name' or worklogDate > startOfYear() and worklogComment ~ 'user.email') and summary ~ 'SUPPORT:'

issueGroups.name: Projects
issueGroups.query: (assignee='user.name' or issueKey in IssueHistory() or issueKey in updatedBy('user.name', '-3w', '1d') or watcher = 'user.name' and worklogComment ~ 'user.email') and summary ~ 'PROJECT:'

issueGroups.name: Run The Business
issueGroups.query: (assignee='user.name' or issueKey in IssueHistory() or issueKey in updatedBy('user.name', '-3w', '1d') or watcher = 'user.name' and worklogComment ~ 'user.email') and summary ~ 'RTB:'

issueGroups.name: Administration
issueGroups.query: (assignee='user.name' or issueKey in IssueHistory() or issueKey in updatedBy('user.name', '-3w', '1d') or watcher = 'user.name' and worklogComment ~ 'user.email') and summary ~ 'ADMIN:'

issueGroups.name: Other
issueGroups.query: (assignee='user.name' or issueKey in IssueHistory() or issueKey in updatedBy('user.name', '-3w', '1d') or watcher = 'user.name' and worklogComment ~ 'user.email') and (summary !~ 'SUPPORT:' and summary !~ 'PROJECT:' and summary !~ 'RTB:' and summary !~ 'ADMIN:')
